title: ChatGPT touches down on smartwatches – and it looks like a sci-fi dream
description: Amazfit beats out the tech giants by adding generative AI to a smartwatch that can dish out fitness advice.

title: AMD motherboards are about to get a massive memory upgrade
description: AMD motherboards are set to support 24GB and 48GB DDR5 RAM modules after Intel added support for the new RAM scheme.

title: Acronis admits to mega data leak - but it might not be as bad as it seems
description: Only one unlucky customer had credentials taken, Acronis says.

title: This dangerous Windows ransomware is now going after Linux networks too
description: IceFire spotted targeting Linux devices as researchers warn of a growing trend.

title: Microsoft claims ChatGPT 4 will be able to make videos, and this won’t end well
description: Microsoft wants ChatGPT-powered Bing to make videos, proving we’re in worst timeline

title: Super-fast storage could make Windows 11 and games load faster than ever
description: SSD manufacturers Sabrent and Phison are working on a new range of SSDs that could boast speeds up to 14,000 MB/s.

title: Sony C700N cheap noise-cancelling earbuds look likely to launch very soon
description: Import filing shows new affordable in-ears will boast ANC and Bluetooth 5.2 support.

title: SonicWall is being attacked by some very persistent malware
description: The malware is believed to have survived firmware updates, and might have infected the devices years ago.

title: An upcoming Roku update will make it easier to find the shows you love to watch
description: Roku OS 12 is arriving in the coming weeks to make it easier to use your streaming device and revamps news and sports content.

title: GitHub is bringing in mandatory 2FA
description: GitHub confirms roll out of compulsory 2FA activation to all users by the end of 2023.

title: 7 new movies and TV shows on Netflix, Prime Video, HBO Max and more this weekend (March 10)
description: From returning Netflix dramas to brand new reality shows, there’s plenty to watch this weekend.

title: Polar's next watch could run WearOS – and that would be bad news for Apple
description: A Polar WearOS watch could be the true fitness smartwatch Android users need.

title: AT&T alerts millions of customers following major data breach
description: AT&T data compromised after a supply chain attack targeted one of its marketing vendors.

title: WhatsApp says it would rather face a UK ban than weaken its security
description: WhatsApp thinks end-to-end encryption would be undermined, as so do many others

title: Banned Chinese firms are simply renting US cloud tech - and getting a pretty decent deal
description: Chinese AI companies are still renting US chips - and buying them through intermediaries - despite bans.

title: Confusion, errors and delays: what’s really going on with Google Bard?
description: Following a less-than-ideal demonstration, Google has apparently refocused on the very core of what Bard is supposed to be.

title: The Apple Music Classical app will have one annoying limitation
description: The Apple Music Classical app will have a few small limitations at launch – including one that could restrict where you can listen.

title: How to make seamless customer support simple in 2023
description: An easy-to-use setup makes life simpler for technicians and users alike.

title: Apple's next HomePod is tipped to be its take on the Amazon Echo Show
description: Apple's next HomePod smart speaker could have a screen to help it take on the Amazon Echo Show 15 and other models.

description: Fortnite’s latest update is bursting with psychedelic cyberpunk absurdity as well as more than a few surprises.

description: Mortal Kombat 12 is on the horizon and it’s set to be jam-packed full of gore-fuelled fights and glorious Fatalities.

title: Microsoft finally fixes annoying Windows 11 file copying bug
description: Hugely annoying Windows 11 bug that seriously slowed down copying files is resolved with Moment 2 update.

title: iPhone 17 could get under-display Face ID, while iPhone 19 could regain Touch ID?
description: Apple has apparently hit a snag in its plans for under-display Face ID, but it might bring Touch ID back too.

title: You won't even be able to escape ChatGPT at work now, thanks to Microsoft
description: ChatGPT is now in preview in Azure OpenAI Service as Microsoft gears up to deliver AI to more customers.

description: Batman: Caped Crusader, a new animated TV series from JJ Abrams and Matt Reeves, has found its new streaming home.

title: Windows 11 preview shows a File Explorer ready to recommend what you open next
description: The latest Preview Build comes with business-centric features like File Recommendations and some updated language tools.

title: Lenovo’s new Thinkstation PX workstation has up to 120 CPU cores but misses a crucial feature
description: It can take four Nvidia RTX 6000 but still doesn’t have Thunderbolt 4 ports.
